column3: dɛ
column5: "Morokɔ asaase do nkorɔfo nyinara kwan no: dɛm ntsi hyɛ dzen

column2: "na sie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn n’ahwɛdodze no
column3: dɛ ebɛnantsew n’akwan mu
column5: na ne mbransɛm
column8: dɛ mbrɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Moses mbra no mu tse no
column9: ama aayɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ dza eyɛ nyinara mu
column10: na beebiara so a edan woho fa:"

column2: "ama EWURADZE aama n’asɛm a ɔkae no wɔ mo ho no etsim
column3: dɛ
column4: Sɛ wo mba hwɛ hɔn kwan yie
column5: dɛ wɔdze hɔn akoma nyinara na hɔn kra nyinara bɛnantsew m’enyim nokwar mu a
column6: ɔnodze (ɔse dɛ) Israel ahengua do nyimpa rommbɔ wo da."

column2: "Nkyii so ɔwoara nyim dza Zeruia ba Joab so dze yɛɛ me
column3: mekyerɛ dza ɔdze yɛɛ Israel dɔm mu asafohemfo beenu no
column5: na Jeter ne ba Amasa a okunkum hɔn na ɔkaa ɔsa mu bɔgya gui wɔ asomdwee ber mu
column6: na ɔdze ɔsa mu bɔgya kekaa n’abɔdo a ɔbɔ n’asen ho
column7: na ne mpaboa a ɔhyɛ n’anan ho no mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi yɛ no dɛ mbrɛ wo nyansaa tse
column3: na mma mma ne tsigon nnsian nnkɔ adakamona mu asomdwee mu."

column2: "Mbom Gileadnyi Barzillai ne mba no na kyerɛ ayamuyie wɔ hɔn do
column3: na ma wɔmfora hɔn a wodzidzi wo pon do no mu. Osiandɛ wɔyɛɛ me ayamuyie wɔ aber a mifii wo nua Absalom enyim muguanee no."

column2: "Na afei hwɛ
column3: Benjaminnyi Simei
column4: Gera ne ba no a ofi Bahurim no wɔ wo nkyɛn
column5: ɔno na ɔdze ndom yerɛyerɛw doom me da no a mokɔr Mahanaim no: naaso ekyir no osianee behyiaa me kwan wɔ Jordan do
column6: na medze EWURADZE kaa ntam kyerɛɛ no
column8: Emi mara dze meremmfa afona munnku wo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei mma ɔmmfa noho tɔtrɔtɔ
column3: na ɔwoara yɛ onyansafo yi
column4: ibohu dza ɔsɛ dɛ edze yɛ no
column5: na ama ne tsigon dze bɔgya eesian akɔ adakamona mu."

column2: "Nna afei David kɛkaa n’egyanom ho wɔ nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no wɔ David kurow no mu."

column2: "Na nda a David dze dzii Israel do hen yɛ mfe eduanan: odzii hen mfe esuon wɔ Hebron
column3: na odzii hen mfe eduasa ebiasa wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na Solomon tsenaa n’egya David n’ahengua do; na n’ahendzi tsiim dzendzenndzen."
"Nna Hagit ne ba Adonija baa Solomon ne na Bat-seba nkyɛn. Na Bat-seba bisaa no dɛ
column3: Eba no asomdwee mu anaa? Na obuaa dɛ

column2: "Afei Adonija see dɛ
column3: Mowɔ asɛm bi ka kyerɛ wo. Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na Adonija see dɛ
column3: Ɔwoara inyim dɛ ahendzi no yɛ medze
column4: na Israel nyinara dze hɔn enyi sii mo do dɛ mara na mibedzi hen: naaso ahendzi no adan
column5: na ɔakɛyɛ mo nua dze: na EWURADZE na ɔama ɔayɛ nedze."

column2: "Na afei ebisadze kor pɛ na miribisa no wo hɔ
column3: mma nnkam me. Na ɔsee no dɛ

column2: "Na Adonija see dɛ
column3: Meserɛ wo
column5: (na ɔrennse wo dɛ oho
column6: ) ma ɔmfa Sunamnyi Abisag mma me ayewar."

column2: "Na Bat-seba see dɛ
column3: Oye; mebɛka akyerɛ ɔhen ama wo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Bat-seba sii mu kɔr ɔhen Solomon nkyɛn
column3: dɛ ɔrekɛkasa akyerɛ no ama Adonija. Na ɔhen no soɛree kehyiaa no
column4: na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze maa no
column5: na ɔkɛtsenaa n’ahengua do
column6: na ɔmaa wɔdze ahengua besii hɔ maa ne na; na ɔtsenaa do wɔ n’enyimfa."

column2: "Nna Bat-seba see no dɛ
column3: Ebisadze ketseabaa bi na miribebisa wɔ wo hɔ; mma nnkam me. Na ɔhen no see no dɛ
column5: bisa ɛ: na merennkam wo."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ma wɔmfa Sunamnyi Abisag mma wo nua Adonija ayewar."

column2: "Na ɔhen Solomon buae na ɔsee ne na dɛ
column3: Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na iribisa Sunamnyi Abisag ama Adonija? Bisa ahendzi no so ma no ɛ; na ɔno nye mo nua panyin; bisa ma ɔno
column5: na Zeruia ba Joab."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Solomon dze EWURADZE kaa ntam
column3: dɛ
column5: na bi so nka ho
column6: se Adonija nnkaa asɛm yi nntsiaa nankasa no nkwa a."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei dɛ EWURADZE a oetsintsim me
column3: na ɔdze me atsena m’egya David n’ahengua do
column4: na ɔdze ama menye m’asefo dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɔɔ anohoba no
column5: tse ase yi
column6: ampa woboku Adonija ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na ɔhen Solomon nam Jehoiada ne ba Benaia ne nsa do somae; na okotui hyɛɛ no do
column3: ma owui."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see ɔsɔfo Abiathar dɛ
column3: Kɔ wankasa wo haban mu
column4: wɔ Anathot; na efata owu dze naaso murunnku wo
column5: osiandɛ ɔwo na esoaa EWURADZE Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no wɔ m’egya David enyim
column6: na ihun amandze wɔ dza m’egya hun mu amandze no nyinara mu."

column2: "Nna Solomon paam Abiathar dɛ ɔnnyɛ ɔsɔfo mma EWURADZE bio; ama ɔaahyɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔkae no wɔ Eli fi ho wɔ Siloh no ma."
"Na amandzɛɛ no dur Joab nkyɛn: na kaansa Joab ɔanndan ennkedzi Absalom ekyir mpo a
column3: ɔadan ekedzi Adonija ekyir. Na Joab guanee kɔr EWURADZE no Buw no mu
column4: na okosuoo afɔrmbukyia no ne mmbɛn mu."

column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ ɔhen Solomon dɛ
column3: Joab eguan kɔ EWURADZE no Buw no mu
column5: ɔwɔ afɔrmbukyia no ho. Nna Solomon somaa Jehoiada ne ba Benaia dɛ

column2: "Na Benaia kɔr EWURADZE no Buw no mu
column3: na ɔkɛsee no dɛ
column5: Pue bra. Na ɔsee dɛ
column6: Dabida; mubowu ha ara. Na Benaia dze asɛm brɛɛ ɔhen bio
column9: na mbrɛ oebua me nye yi."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see no dɛ
column3: Yɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔase no ara
column5: na sie no; ama eeyi bɔgya a Joab kae guu gyan no efi emi na m’egya fie do."

column5: ber a m’egya David nnyim ho hwee

column5: na n’ahengua dze

column3: na okotui hyɛɛ no do
column5: na wokesiee no wɔ nankasa ne fie wɔ sar no do."

column2: "Na ɔhen no dze Jehoiada ne ba Benaia hyɛɛ n’ananmu wɔ dɔm no do: na ɔhen no dze ɔsɔfo Zadok hyɛɛ Abiathar n’ananmu."
"Na ɔhen no somaa ma wokehyiaa Simei
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Si dan ma woho wɔ Jerusalɛm
column5: na tsena hɔ
column6: na mma mmfi hɔ mmpue nnkɔ beebiara."

column2: "Na da no ara a ibopue
column3: na ekotwa ɔwora Kidron no
column5: owu ara na ibowu: wo bɔgyaa bogu wankasa w’etsifi."

column2: "Na Simei see ɔhen no dɛ
column3: Asɛm no ye: dɛ mbrɛ mo wura ɔhen ase no
column4: dɛmara so na w’akowaa bɛyɛ. Na Simei tsenaa Jerusalɛm nda pii."

column5: dɛ ɔrokɔhwehwɛ no nkowaa no: na ɔkɛfaa hɔn fi Gat bae."

column2: "Na ɔhen Solomon dze
column3: nhyira bɛka no
column4: na David n’ahengua no betsim wɔ EWURADZE enyim daa."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no hyɛɛ Jehoiada ne ba Benaia; na ofiir edzi kokum no. Na ahendzi no tsimii wɔ Solomon ne nsamu."
